general.headline: Backend Developer
about: ðŸ‘‹ Hey there! I'm Sergio Del Castillo

I'm a backend developer with over 8 years of experience building scalable, cross-platform software solutions. With a background in Communications and Electronic Engineering, I bring a strong technical foundation that enhances my ability to design efficient backend systems and manage complex database architectures, with Node.js as my core technology.
I'm passionate about developing secure, high-performance, and high-quality applications, always committed to best practices, continuous improvement, and effective collaboration within dynamic teams.
Outside of development, I enjoy life's simple pleasuresâ€”especially pizzaâ€”and I'm driven by a constant curiosity to learn, grow, and take on new challenges.

experiences.title: Backend Developer
experiences.description: I'm working on a project that uses Node.js, AWS, CI/CD, Next.js, and PostgreSQL. I'm also responsible for the backend development of the project.

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
experiences.description: I localized the website from Spain to Mexico, adapting the Spanish translation and implementing regional payment methods for the Latin American market.
